abstract: Along with a reported initial public offering planned for HCA, the big hospital operator whose $33 billion takeover in 2006 heralded many leveraged buyouts, Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and Bain Capital are also said to be preparing I.P.O.’s of two of their other large portfolio companies,Toys ‘R’ Us and NXP SemiConductors, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Along with a reported initial public offering planned for HCA, the big hospital operator whose $33 billion takeover in 2006 heralded many leveraged buyouts, Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and Bain Capital are also said to be preparing I.P.O.’s of two of ...
lead_paragraph: Along with a reported initial public offering planned for HCA, the big hospital operator whose $33 billion takeover in 2006 heralded many giant leveraged buyouts, Kohlberg Kravis Roberts and Bain Capital are also said to be preparing I.P.O.’s of two of their other large portfolio companies, Toys ‘R’ Us and NXP SemiConductors, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the deals.

headline.main: K.K.R. and Bain Said to Plot I.P.O.’s
